name: Void Boys
description:
Welcome to the successor to Chaos Disciple.

A simple and satisfying top-down hack-and-slash experience where you play as a cute little cyclops fighting off an ever-increasing army of grunts, born from the void. Grab a weapon, a special, and a hat and get slaying. 

Features:

- 3-tiered build selection leads to creating fun synergies

- Enemy level increases over time

- Simple combat focused on aim and synergy

- One smart enemy with some sick glasses on

- Endlessly increasing score

- Advice after death
